item.title: Create or Continue Priesthood Links
item.description:
Create or Continue Priesthood Links by Elder Keith K. Hilbig, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 171st Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 2001
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Keith K. Hilbig, Of the Seventy

item.title: Quench Not the Spirit Which Quickens the Inner Man
item.description:
Quench Not the Spirit Which Quickens the Inner Man by Elder Keith K. Hilbig, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 177th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 2007
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
